Project Corpus

A growing collection of my projects, case studies, and process write‑ups.

Code Context Builder

Tauri desktop app to scan codebases and assemble robust, LLM‑ready prompts (Sentinel/Markdown/XML) with smart compression, presets, and token counting.

ravel-rs (RAVEL-0 Bootstrap)

Minimal Rust toolchain that parses a tiny RAVEL-0 language and emits runnable Rust, proving the end-to-end model for a 2‑D programming language with explicit concurrency.

Active
